channel.title: life on Abel Soares Siqueira
channel.description: Recent content in life on Abel Soares Siqueira

item.title: Long time away
item.description: Hello, it’s been a long time since my last post, and a lot has happened since. I’ve had difficulty finding time to write a good post, or even a bad post, sometimes, but now I return with a brief explaining, and some possible continuation posts. First, during the classes period, I have a lot of obligations that use a lot of time: Preparing classes, tests, projects, grading, etc. This was most of my time.
